item.description:
Join Boston Event Guide for Luxury White Water Rafting in Maine August 24th – 26th

Use this LINK: When paying write In comment section Group name: (LISA Provd. meetup group) I reserved Cabin Tent(S)  8 people in each tent and RAFT! Limit @ 16 peeps! 

http://www.bostoneventguide.com/events/rafting12.htm

 

*************RSVP "YES" only after you have paid!!!**********

The Idea is to Drive up Friday and Stay Friday and Saturday night, drive home on Sunday AM or by noon. Rafting on Saturday!   Friday option with Rafting has a Barbecue for lunch with the pricing. choose to stay over Sat night is extra $$.   If you want to pay for any additional food purchases you can by choosing on this site if you have any questions please call Jeff (781-444-7771) This is a glorified Camping Trip. The Cabin Tents are very large with cots in side them. Bath house and out houses within walking distances. Please view the site.  Camp fire Grill at Tent site to use for out door cooking if you did not choose to purchase food. (I did not) I hope this helps!

OUR Trip includes · Stay over Friday/Saturday Night. Drive takes about 5 hrs. Saturday fun day of rafting on the full Kennebec River, ME

· (BBQ Lunch Provided) However, you can choose to pay for any other meals.

· Lodging in cabin tents! Reserved Two for our Group. OUR Limited will be 16 People
eight people per tent and per Raft, Its all about the RAFTS!

· Nightly parties with complimentary beer, wine and select cocktails.

· Hot tub, volleyball, horseshoes and swimming

Our destination is the Kennebec River Gorge

The Kennebec River Gorge is one of the most beautiful in the East with steep rock walls on both sides, and with many waves that are four to six feet high.

Paddle into rapids with names like Big Mama, White Washer, and the infamous Magic Falls. Then, with the rapids behind us, jump in and float with the current while you feel the power of the river taking you downstream.

White Water Rafting in Maine - 8/24 – 8/26 Interested in going please RSVP/AND pay to Boston event guide.  Click on LINK posted below: Before Weekend in AUG we can meet and discuss Car Pooling and what to bring for food and such. Maybe I will host a Potluck/cookout.

http://www.bostoneventguide.com/events/rafting12.htm
item.name: White Water Rafting in Maine
